item.title: GoDataberus - Database Driver API in Golang
item.description: GoDataberus is a “Database Driver API” in order to reduce the complexity of the CRUD operations in some common databases. The idea is to use Databerus in order to connect to a external DB (using an available DB driver) using the same API independently of the database
